ygData.subject: Re: I hope it stays a secret...
ygData.msgSnippet: I think the fishing pole itself is a bit useless.  So it s lighter and can be placed in a small bag, not too thrilling. The real value comes from using the
ygData.messageBody:
I think the fishing pole itself is a bit useless. So it's lighter and can
be placed in a small bag, not too thrilling.
The real value comes from using the pole to make the spyglasses, unlimited
charges of telescopic sight.


At 07:17 AM 08/11/1999 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "Dave Duncan" <deduncan19@...>
>
>I guess I'm just a little curious as to why we think the collapsable
>fishing pole will be so profitable? Is it the pole itself? Or the
>potential to make the spyglass? Just a little curious.
>
>Litre Hosen,
>Gnome Necromancer, Solusek Ro
